Jitsuin Archivist
  • »
  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/archivist
 
/archivist
GET /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies List access policies
GET /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies/{uuid} Get an access policy
GET /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies/{uuid}/assets Returns assets matching access policy
GET /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies:caps Get remaining capped resources for AccessPolicies
GET /archivist/iam/v1/assets/{uuid}/access_policies Get matching access policies
GET /archivist/iam/v1/subjects List subjects
GET /archivist/iam/v1/subjects/{uuid} Get an subject
GET /archivist/v1/archivistnode Get information about an archivist node
GET /archivist/v1/attachments/{uuid} Get an attachment
GET /archivist/v1/attachments/{uuid}/info Get attachment metadata
GET /archivist/v1/compliance/assets/{uuid} List all compliance status relevant to an asset
GET /archivist/v1/compliance_policies null
GET /archivist/v1/compliance_policies/{uuid} null
GET /archivist/v1/compliance_policies:caps Get remaining capped resources for CompliancePolicies
GET /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates List TLS CA certificates
GET /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates/{uuid} Get a TLS CA certificate
GET /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates:caps Get remaining capped resources for TLSCACertificates
GET /archivist/v1alpha1/blockchain/assets/{asset_uuid}/events/{uuid} Get the list of blockchain transactions that made up an Archivist Event
GET /archivist/v2/assets List Archivist assets
GET /archivist/v2/assets/{asset_uuid}/events/{uuid} Retrieves Archivist event
GET /archivist/v2/assets/{uuid} Retrieves a specific Archivist asset
GET /archivist/v2/assets/{uuid}/events List Archivist events
GET /archivist/v2/locations List locations
GET /archivist/v2/locations/{uuid} Get a location
GET /archivist/v2/locations/{uuid}/permissions Get location permissions
GET /archivist/v2/locations:caps Get remaining capped resources for Locations
POST /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies Create an access policy
POST /archivist/iam/v1/subjects Create an subject
POST /archivist/v1/compliance_policies null
POST /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates Upload a TLS CA certificate
POST /archivist/v2/assets Create an Archivist asset
POST /archivist/v2/locations Create a location
DELETE /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies/{uuid} Delete an access policy
DELETE /archivist/iam/v1/subjects/{uuid} Delete a subject
DELETE /archivist/v1/compliance_policies/{uuid} null
DELETE /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates/{uuid} Delete a TLS C Acertificate
DELETE /archivist/v2/locations/{uuid} Delete a location
PATCH /archivist/iam/v1/access_policies/{uuid} Update a access policy details
PATCH /archivist/iam/v1/subjects/{uuid} Update a subject's details
PATCH /archivist/v1/tlscacertificates/{uuid} Update a TLS CA certificate's details
PATCH /archivist/v2/locations/{uuid} Update a location's details
PATCH /archivist/v2/locations/{uuid}/permissions Patch location permissions
